projects.title: LifeCycle Fall Detection
projects.description: I have successfully Designed, developed, implemented, tested, and documented the embedded or distributed software applications, tools, systems, and services. Actually, Lifecycle is a product that detecting a fall of an elderly user. After the fall it sends out a message to a contact that is been stepped inside an application. Languages used for application are Dart & Flutter. Communicating to a Node JS REST API that stores all values in Firestore.

projects.title: Smart Meter Dashboard
projects.description: Another successfully completed project “Smart Meter Dashboard”. I have designed, developed and maintained the Dashboard for the Dutch Smart Meter Circuit Board & React (P1) for real time results and accuracy. The ESP wrote and saved values in MongoDB for the REST API. The API values are displayed in the react dashboard. In Altium Designer, the PCB is designed. The application is configured and maintained under K8S. ESP8226 is developed and programmed in C using libs.

projects.title: Retro Nixie Clock & More
projects.description: I performed detailed design analysis and reviews with hardware engineering team to achieve product performance, cost, reliability, and manufacturability requirements. As ancient technology, I like especially tubes of Soviet nixie. I used in this project 2 IN-9 tubes controlled by an Eagle PCB Designer Circuit Board. Display various views, such as a spectrum analyzer, clock, timer and a thermometer, on the device via Rotation. The housing is produced and processed via Solid works and CNC milling. The clock application code is written using Platform IO in C++.
